DOC.brief_summary: This phase III comparative study evaluate effectiveness safety DA-3801 treatment patient WHO Group II anovulatory infertility fail clomiphene citrate treatment . The study conduct follow method : open label , active-controlled , randomize , parallel group , comparative .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase III Clinical Study Compare Efficacy Safety DA-3801 That Gonal-FÂ®
DOC.criteria: WHO group II Clomiphene citrate resistance BMI : 17~29 kg/m^2 Irregular menstrual cycle Normal blood concentration FSH , E2 , prolactin TSH Uncontrolled endocrine disease Ovarian cystic tumor NOT relate PCOS Severe endometriosis Chronic cardiovascular disease , liver complaint
